author: cmorgan@businessinsider.com (Clancy Morgan), Clancy Morgan
title: Why South Korea's coronavirus curve looks so different from the United States
description: As COVID-19 spreads around the world, some countries' timelines look different from others. With a combination of contact tracing, testing, and isolating cases, along with other physical distancing policies, places like South Korea were able to reduce the siz…
content:
